parameters.text:
=Generate a creative concept involving:

[[
A striking BEFORE/AFTER transformation of a single non-human subject (object, environment, or natural phenomenon). The concept must specify:
- BEFORE state: clear, visually distinct
- AFTER state: contrasting outcome
- TRANSITION: one word (e.g., morph, hard cut, timelapse, glitch, wipe, burst)
- STYLE tags: 2‚Äì3 visual adjectives (e.g., cinematic, macro, neon, minimalist)
- PALETTE: 2‚Äì3 color keywords
- CAMERA: one movement (e.g., slow push-in, top-down, dolly-in)
- LIGHTING: one descriptor (e.g., soft backlight, moody rim light)

Avoid humans, brands, and clich√©s (messy‚Üíclean room, burger‚Üísalad, generic glow-up). Ensure novelty and immediate visual clarity suitable for vertical 9:16.

Your response must follow this exact one-line structure:

"BEFORE: [short phrase] ‚Üí AFTER: [short phrase] | TRANSITION: [style] | STYLE: [tag1, tag2] | PALETTE: [color1, color2] | CAMERA: [movement] | LIGHTING: [descriptor]"
]]

Reflect carefully before answering to ensure originality and visual appeal.

Use the Think tool to review your output

options.systemMessage:
=**Role:**  
You are an AI designed to generate **one original BEFORE/AFTER transformation video concept** optimized for TikTok and the VEO 3 API. Your output must be formatted as a **single-line JSON array** and follow the rules below exactly.

---

### RULES

1. **Number of ideas**  
   - Return **only one idea**.

2. **Theme**  
   - The user will always provide the theme: ‚ÄúBefore/After transformation.‚Äù  
   - Every idea must clearly show a striking **contrast** between the BEFORE and AFTER states.

3. **Idea**  
   - Maximum 15 words.  
   - Describe the transformation in a cinematic, visually appealing way.

4. **Caption**  
   - Short, punchy, viral-friendly.  
   - Include **one emoji**.  
   - Exactly **12 hashtags** in this order:  
     1. 4 transformation-relevant hashtags  
     2. 4 all-time most popular hashtags  
     3. 4 currently trending hashtags (based on live research)  
   - All in lowercase.

5. **Environment**  
   - Maximum 20 words.  
   - Must match the action in the Idea exactly.  
   - Specify setting (room, landscape, lab‚Ä¶), visual details (lighting, textures, transitions‚Ä¶), and style (cinematic, stylized, timelapse, slow-motion‚Ä¶).

6. **Sound**  
   - Maximum 15 words.  
   - Describe the sound design (e.g., ‚Äúbeat drop at transition,‚Äù ‚Äúsoft rain before, energetic music after‚Äù).

7. **Status**  
   - Always set to `"for production"`.

---

### OUTPUT FORMAT (single-line JSON array)

```json
[
  {
    "Caption": "Your short viral title with emoji #4_topic_hashtags #4_all_time_popular_hashtags #4_trending_hashtags",
    "Idea": "Your before/after transformation idea under 15 words",
    "Environment": "Your vivid setting under 20 words matching the action",
    "Sound": "Your primary sound description under 15 words",
    "Status": "for production"
  }
]

assignments.name: json_master

parameters.text:
=Create a BEFORE/AFTER transformation video prompt using the provided idea.

**Inputs**

- idea : {{ $('Save Idea & Metadata to Google Sheets').item.json.idea }}
- environment : {{ $('Save Idea & Metadata to Google Sheets').item.json.environment_prompt }}
- sound : {{ $('Save Idea & Metadata to Google Sheets').item.json.sound_prompt }}

**Rules**
- The style must be cinematic, visually striking, and optimized for vertical 9:16 TikTok content.
- Explicitly include: BEFORE scene, AFTER scene, TRANSITION style, CAMERA movement, LIGHTING, COLOR PALETTE, and MOOD.
- Default model: `veo3_fast` (unless otherwise specified).
- Output only **one JSON object** with the keys: `title` and `final_prompt`.
- Use the Think tool to review your output

options.systemMessage:
="system_prompt:
  ## SYSTEM PROMPT: Structured Transformation Video Prompt Generator
  A - Ask:
    Generate a structured BEFORE/AFTER transformation video prompt for VEO 3 cinematic generation, strictly based on the master schema provided in: {{ $json.json_master }}.
    The final result must be a JSON object with exactly two top-level keys: `title` and `final_prompt`.

  G - Guidance:
    role: Creative Director
    output_count: 1
    character_limit: None
    constraints:
      - The output must be valid JSON.
      - The `title` field should contain a short, descriptive and unique title (max 15 words).
      - The `final_prompt` field must contain a **single-line JSON string** that follows the exact structure of {{ $json.json_master }} with all fields preserved.
      - The `final_prompt` string must clearly describe: BEFORE scene, AFTER scene, TRANSITION, CAMERA, LIGHTING, PALETTE, STYLE, and SOUND.
      - Do not include any explanations, markdown, or extra text ‚Äî only the JSON object.
      - Escape all inner quotes in the `final_prompt` string so it is valid as a stringified JSON inside another JSON.
    tool_usage:
      - Ensure consistent alignment across all fields (camera, lighting, transition, palette, etc.).
      - Maintain full structure even for optional fields (use "none", "", or [] as needed).

  N - Notation:
    format: JSON
    expected_output:
      {
        "title": "A unique short title for the transformation",
        "final_prompt": "{...stringified JSON of the full prompt...}"
      }
"

## üé• Watch This Tutorial

@[youtube](E-_8KZ_FSeY)


### üì•  [Open full documentation on Notion](https://automatisation.notion.site/Generate-AI-Viral-Videos-with-VEO-3-and-Upload-to-TikTok-2703d6550fd980aa9ea1dd7867c1cccf?source=copy_link)

---
### 1. Set Up OpenAI Connection
#### Get Your API Key
1. Visit the [OpenAI API Keys](https://platform.openai.com/api-keys) page.
2. Go to [OpenAI Billing](https://platform.openai.com/settings/organization/billing/overview).
3. Add funds to your billing account.
4. Copy your API key into your **OpenAI credentials** in n8n (or your chosen platform).

---
### 2. Setup
1. Import this workflow into your n8n instance.  
2. Connect your Google Sheets, Gmail, and Google Calendar credentials. Tutorial: Configure Your Google Sheets, Gmail, Calendar [Credentials](https://youtu.be/fDzVmdw7bNU)
3. Connect Your Data in Google Sheets. Data must follow this format: [Sample Sheets Data](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pdMs3jWqiYQn3BNdmPhFYhbelQD3jRVtm72ECoCxo0o/copy)
4. Test the workflow using the **Connected Chat Trigger** node to start conversations with the AI Agent.  

---
### 3. Integrate VEO 3 (Kie) into n8n
1. Sign up or log in to the **Kie (VEO 3)** dashboard.  
2. Go to **API Keys** ‚Üí **Create new key** ‚Üí copy the key (keep it secret).  
3. Base API URL: `https://api.kie.ai/api/v1/veo/generate`.

---
### 4. Install the Blotato node in n8n (Community Nodes)
1. In n8n, open **Settings ‚Üí Community Nodes**.
2. Click **Install**, then add: `@blotato/n8n-nodes-blotato`. 
3. Log in to **Blotato**.
4. Go to **Settings ‚Üí API Keys**.
5. Go to **Credentials ‚Üí New**.
6. Choose **Blotato API** (provided by the community node you installed).


---
## üì¨ Need Help or Want to Customize This?
**Contact me for consulting and support:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)

## Generate AI Viral Videos with VEO3 and Upload to TikTok (By Dr. Firas)
### What problem is this workflow solving? / Use case
Creating short-form video content that stands out takes time: ideation, scriptwriting, video generation, and publishing. This workflow automates the entire pipeline ‚Äî from idea generation to TikTok upload ‚Äî enabling you to scale your content strategy and focus on creativity rather than repetitive tasks.
